channel.title: Meeting on OpenChain KWG

item.title: 25th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Schedule: 2025-03-25 (Tue) 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM Location: Korea Digital Certification Association (Yeouido Park One Building Tower 2, 48th floor) - https://maps.app.goo.gl/YnxTkz8LjHPXFJBv6 Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 14:00~14:10 Welcome & Opening - - 14:10~14:30 OpenChain Global Update Shane Coughlan, Linux Foundation pptx 14:30~14:50 OpenChain Korea Update Haksung Jang, SK Telecom slide 14:50~15:00 Lightning Talk 1 - Open Source Tech Day 2025 Announcement - Jeong-sook Par, ETRI pdf 15:00~15:30 Mobile ID application “DID”, open source governance strategy and future tasks?

item.title: 26th Meeting
item.description: Schedule Date: 2025-06-16 (Mon) 2:00 PM ~ 5:00 PM Venue: Samsung Electronics Seoul R&D Campus - https://maps.app.goo.gl/ZsQWvnSc5MPXKVcN8 Agenda Time Agenda Speaker Slide 14:00~14:10 Welcome & Opening Suhong Park, Samsung Electronics - 14:10~14:30 OpenChain Global Update Shane Coughlan, Linux Foundation - 14:30~14:40 OpenChain Korea Update Haksung Jang, SK Telecom - 14:40~15:10 Samsung Electronics Open Source 2025 Darae Ahn, Samsung Electronics - 15:10~15:50 Networking All - 15:50~16:20 AI Data Compliance Process Jungwon Cho, LG AI Research Institute - 16:20~16:50 Lightning Talk - Risks When Using Open AI Models in Enterprises - Changes in Redis Licensing and Its Impact on the Open Source Ecosystem - Yunhwan Jung, Samsung Electronics
